title: Shavuot at Mekor | Mekor 3
headings:
Shavuot Schedule of Services at Mekor
​5785/2025
text: Skip to Main Content Membership Events Donate Kiddush Center City Beit Midrash Join Us Davening Who We Are Kosher Restaurants More Support Mekor Shavuot Services Shavuot Schedule of Services at Mekor ​5785/2025 Center City Jewish Night of Learning is Back! There are some changes this year in terms of location and start of the evening so please check out the updated schedule and pertinent information by clicking this link or visiting https://www.phillyshavuot.org/ For any questions about Call (215) 535-4246 or email the shul, and you will hear back soon from Rabbi Hirsch. Kindly RSVP for all of services you plan to attend Wishing everyone a happy and Joyous Shavuot! Zmanim for Philadelphia - Shavuot 2025/5785 Sunday, June 1 [Sivan 5-6] Erev Shavuot - Omer 49 6:45 am - Shacharit 7:45 pm - Candle Lighting 8:15 pm – Evening Services 9:30 pm - Tikun Leil Shavuot at BZBI ​ Monday, June 2 [Sivan 6-7] Shavuot Day 1 6:55 am - Shacharit 6:17 pm - Plag HaMincha 7:17 pm - Candle lighting 7:00 pm Evening Services* 7:35 pm - Sunset ​ Tuesday, June 3 [Sivan 7-8] Shavuot Day 2 8:00am - Morning Services followed by kiddush 10:50 am - Latest time for eating chametz 11:55 am - Latest time for relinquishing chametz 4:21 pm - End of 9th hour 6:17 pm - Plag HaMincha 7:15 pm Evening Services* 7:36 pm - Sunset 8:19 pm - Earliest Candle Lighting/Nightfall/Tzeit Hakochavim 1:00 am - Havdalah/Shavuot Ends * If we get a minyan signed up in advance. Mekor Habracha Center City Synagogue (215) 525-4246 admin@mekorhabracha.org ​ 1500 Walnut St Suite 206 Philadelphia, PA 19102 SUBSCRIBE TO OUR WEEKLY NEWSLETTER Enter your email here SUBSCRIBE Latest Newsletters Copyright ©2025 by Mekor Habracha Synagogue

    Shavuot Services 

    Shavuot Schedule of Services at Mekor
    ​5785/2025

    Center City Jewish Night of Learning is Back!

    There are some changes this year in terms of location and start of the evening so please check out the updated schedule and pertinent information by clicking this link or visiting https://www.phillyshavuot.org/

    For any questions about Call (215) 535-4246 or email the shul, and you will hear back soon from Rabbi Hirsch.

    Kindly RSVP for all of services you plan to attend

    Wishing everyone a happy and Joyous Shavuot!

    Zmanim for Philadelphia - Shavuot 2025/5785

    Sunday, June 1  [Sivan 5-6] Erev Shavuot - Omer 49

    6:45 am - Shacharit 

    7:45 pm - Candle Lighting 

    8:15 pm – Evening Services

    9:30 pm - Tikun Leil Shavuot at BZBI

    ​

    Monday, June 2 [Sivan 6-7] Shavuot Day 1

    6:55 am - Shacharit

    6:17 pm  - Plag HaMincha

    7:17 pm  - Candle lighting

    7:00 pm  Evening Services*

    7:35 pm - Sunset

    ​

    Tuesday, June 3 [Sivan 7-8] Shavuot Day 2

    8:00am - Morning Services followed by kiddush

    10:50 am - Latest time for eating chametz

    11:55 am - Latest time for relinquishing chametz

    4:21 pm  - End of 9th hour

    6:17 pm - Plag HaMincha

    7:15 pm  Evening Services*

    7:36 pm - Sunset

    8:19 pm - Earliest Candle Lighting/Nightfall/Tzeit

    Hakochavim

    1:00 am - Havdalah/Shavuot Ends

    * If we get a minyan signed up in advance.

    Mekor Habracha
    Center City Synagogue

    (215) 525-4246
